MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Corsock. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified a broken electricity pole and grounded overhead power lines. Our team have been working throughout the evening to carry out repairs and are in the final stages of restoration. We now expect your supply to be restored by 11:30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:00pm on Saturday 31st October 2020
